reset.title: Reset
reset.description: Are you sure you want to reset this section?

clear-resume.title: Clear Resume
clear-resume.description: Are you sure you want to clear your resume?

snapshot-restore-before.title: Restore to before
snapshot-restore-before.description: Restore the resume to the state before this optimization?

snapshot-restore-after.title: Restore to after
snapshot-restore-after.description: Restore the resume to the state after this optimization?

snapshot-delete.title: Delete snapshot
snapshot-delete.description: Delete this snapshot? This cannot be undone.

chat-history-delete.title: Delete chat
chat-history-delete.description: Delete this chat history? This cannot be undone.

message.export-failed: Export failed, please check your data
message.import-failed: Invalid JSON format, Please check your data
message.upload-format-failed: Only JPEG, PNG, and WebP images are supported
message.upload-size-failed: Image size must be less than 5MB
message.share-create-success: Share link created and copied to clipboard

tag-input.placeholder: Type and press Enter to add

photo-uploader.title: Adjust Photo
photo-uploader.description: Crop and adjust your photo size

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: Add your professional skills and expertise

work-experience.title: Work Experience
work-experience.subtitle: Add your professional work experience and achievements
work-experience.name: Company / Organization

project-experience.title: Projects
project-experience.subtitle: Showcase your personal or professional projects
project-experience.name: Project Name

custom-section.title: Custom Section
custom-section.subtitle: Add custom sections with markdown content. Use markdown headers to define section titles.

settings.title: Export Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure PDF export options including paper size, margins, and format settings.

scale-and-pages.title: Scale and Pages
scale-and-pages.description: Configure rendering scale and page selection
scale-and-pages.leave-empty-tip: Leave empty to print all pages

display-options.title: Display Options
display-options.description: Configure what to include in the PDF

export.title: Export Resume Data
export.description: Edit and export resume JSON data

import.title: Import Resume Data
import.description: Upload a JSON file or paste JSON content

theme.title: Resume Templates
theme.subtitle: Select a style theme for your resume content

resume-list.title: My Resumes
resume-list.subtitle: Manage and switch between your resumes

create-modal.title: Create Resume
create-modal.description: Enter a name for this resume

rename-modal.title: Rename Resume
rename-modal.description: Enter a new name for this resume

duplicate-modal.title: Duplicate Resume
duplicate-modal.description: Enter a name for the duplicated resume

delete-confirm.title: Delete Resume
delete-confirm.description: Are you sure you want to delete this resume?

share-list.title: Shared Links
share-list.subtitle: Manage links to share your resume

delete-confirm.title: Delete Share Link
delete-confirm.description: Are you sure you want to delete this share link?

data-link-confirm.title: Generate Data Link
data-link-confirm.description: This will create a permanent link containing your resume data. Anyone with this link can view your resume. Continue?

create-share.title: Create Share Link
create-share.description: Create a shareable link for your resume
create-share.password-hint: Leave empty for no password protection

share-access.share-not-found-description: This share link does not exist or has been deleted.
share-access.share-stopped-by-owner: This share has been stopped by the owner.
share-access.one-time-share-consumed: This one-time share link has been used and can no longer be accessed.

model-provider.title: Model Providers
model-provider.subtitle: Configure AI model providers for AI features

privacy-notice.title: Privacy Notice
privacy-notice.description: Your API keys are stored locally in your browser and never sent to our servers.

chat.placeholder: Ask me anything about your resume...
chat.empty-description: Ask me anything about your resume, get optimization tips, or practice interviews.

snapshot.title: Snapshots
snapshot.tip: Only AI-applied changes are tracked here. User input history is not included. Up to 20 snapshots are stored locally.
